column4: i duel boot 8.10 with 9.04 running ext4...grub info is stored on the ext4 partition...if 8.10 updates kernel will it be able to update the grub info on the 9.04 partition..i was just wondering since 8.10 cant normall access ext4
no plans in 8.10 to include ext4 support, though you could roll your own kernel
sorry, i don't see messages to me unless you put my name in them. no, they won't, yes, you will
unless there's a way to mount ext4 as ext3...
